tool_description: Generate math equations of different difficulties and their results
name: Math Equations API
title: Math Equations API

api_list.name: Very Hard Equation
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a very hard difficulty equation with three numbers, two random operations (square root/cube root/logarithm/power) and a result.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://math-equations-api.p.rapidapi.com/veryhard"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "math-equations-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Easy Calculation
api_list.description: This endpoint returns an easy equation with two numbers 1-100, a random operation (addition/subtraction/multiplication/division) and a result.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://math-equations-api.p.rapidapi.com/easy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "math-equations-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
